title: ESPN's Kevin Arnovitz
description:
Zach takes stock of the league as the quarter poll approaches, then ESPN's Kevin Arnovitz joins to talk the Isaiah -LeBron fracas, more Kings drama, the Wizards and Bulls hot starts, and more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
